roleset.name: worry

example.name: fret about an NP
example.text: Meanwhile , business and government leaders rebuked the computer makers , and fretted about the broader statement the companies ' actions make about Japanese cutthroat pricing .

propbank.arg: about the broader statement the companies ' actions make about Japanese cutthroat pricing

example.name: fret an SBar
example.text: But Mr. Ruffo frets that an even bigger problem could be protectionism from the U.S. , where some politicians oppose what they consider Japanese efforts to use maquiladoras to crack the U.S. market through the back door .

propbank.arg: that an even bigger problem could be protectionism from the U.S. , where some politicians oppose what they consider Japanese efforts to use maquiladoras to crack the U.S. market through the back door

example.name: fret over an SBar
example.text: They are obviously also more susceptible when they need money - retirees , for instance , trying to bolster their fixed income or parents fretting over how to pay for a child 's college expenses .

propbank.arg: over how to pay for a child 's college expenses

roleset.note: FRET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fret' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from fret.01-v predicate notes)
